snippet.title: Two Strikes - Introducing Miyo, the Swordsmith
snippet.description:
In life, the best sword maker in all of Japan, in death, the only assassin in the Shinigami game capable of wielding up to three swords at once. 

Discover Miyo, the Swordsmith in Two Strikes, the hand-drawn fighting game where everything is decided in one or two strikes. 

Available now in Early Access on Steam, and coming soon to all platforms, including last-gen! 

Get in here and Strike or Die! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1586750/Two_Strikes/
